description:
By completing class, you should be able to add an image to your resume to give it a creative edge. You can send the resume you create by email or print out a physical copy. You also will be able to work with the basics of Microsoft Word and/or Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop or Adobe Photoshop Elements.

This is a video based course where students can review a section over and over, skip a section and watch what you need in order to add a resume background to your text resume.

You will need access to a jpeg or png image that you own the copyrights to that would look good on a resume and Microsoft Word. If you would like to modify your image and/or create your own designs, you will need Adobe Illustrator and/or Adobe Photoshop or Adobe Photoshop Elements.

Anyone who would like to add flair or a personal touch to a resume is welcome!
title: Welcome To Designing Resume Backgrounds
